meanings.sent1: The metal box was nonburnable and kept the important documents safe.
meanings.sent2: The nonburnable material used in the construction of the building made it fire-resistant.
meanings.sent3: The nonburnable cake was a hit at the party, as no one had ever seen such a unique dessert before.
meanings.sent4: Her nonburnable determination to succeed in her career was truly inspiring to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The nonburnable fabric was like a shield against the flames, protecting the wearer from harm.

meanings.sent1: The nonburnable chemicals were stored carefully in the lab to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent2: The nonburnable material used in the curtains made the room safer in case of a fire.
meanings.sent3: The nonburnable balloons were a great choice for the party decorations, ensuring no mishaps with candles.
meanings.sent4: His nonburnable attitude towards criticism made him resilient in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The nonburnable forest seemed to defy the laws of nature, untouched by the spreading wildfire.
